mainTextGoal: Our goal is to make sure that you and your home are safe
whatIsSafety1Text: The Safety system is a system that will help the homeowner feel full security both from unauthorized intrusion and from other hazards to the home.
whatIsSafety2Text: Safety system is designed for protection and control of safety in the home, first of all it is aimed at preservation of a person's life, and also preservation of property, all this is achieved by means of convenient system and smart device with all necessary sensors, which allows to feel in safety.
whatIsSafety3Text: Unlike analogues, the system Safety will cover not only part of security controls against unauthorized penetration as well as protection of the house from various unforeseen situations such as leakage of gas, water, fire, which the system will automatically solve and inform the user of the finished scenario or suggest solutions problems, also the user has the ability to customize the script for the sensors which performed when they are triggered.
whatIsOurApplication1: The main part of the safe system is our mobile application, which gives the user full control over our system.
whatIsOurApplication2: Mobile phone is an integral part of every person's life at the moment, so the user will always be able to use our system in any place to check that his/her house is safe. The main goal of the project “Safety” is to ensure full safety both for the house and its owner.
whatIsOurApplication3: Simple, modern user interface that allows you to quickly and easily manage the system.
whatIsOurApplication4: Simple, modern user interface that allows you to quickly and easily manage the system.
whatIsOurApplication5: Simple, modern user interface that allows you to quickly and easily manage the system.
firstCard2: You need to create your own account to manage the system
secondCard2: To use our system you will need our smart device, which you can buy on most trading platforms
thirdCard2: To manage our system, you need a mobile application that allows you to control everything
forthCard2: Your smart device has an activation code activate the device in our app
calculate1: Enter all the data you need to calculate the number of sensors
